original_description: Guaranteed 100% fluff. Not guaranteed to quench your thirst.
For when you’re tired of stripping down like a feral ghoul every time nature calls. Efficiency, baby.
For when you can't bang, so you bang on these instead.
Warning: Wearing these may result in unsolicited ‘grr, baby, grr’ comments.
Guaranteed to give you the confidence of a bear in heat. Proceed with caution.
Made from 100% pure 'I can’t believe I survived that' fur.
+50 to Sneak so you can get in and out without spawning any NPCs.
Great for blocking out unwanted advances... and accountability.
These flowers won’t get you laid, but they will distract her from the fact you haven’t showered in a week.
Bold, dangerous, and guaranteed to make the Purity Police break out in a cold sweat.
When you’re tired of hiding your secrets, but still need something to hold them up.
Perfect for secretly snacking in bed... or whatever else you’re doing alone in bed.
Bounces faster than your heart when the Purity Police start pounding on your door.
Flex hard, die harder.
Sometimes stabbing your problems is the only therapy you need.
Quenches thirst, increases arousal. Side effects may include moaning, sweating, and an awkward talk with the overseer.
The vault's most versatile tool: weapon, food, friend... it's got it all.
Comes pre-loaded with emotional support.
Perfect for romantic nights, regrettable mornings, and definitely some Purity Police paperwork.
For when you’re feeling lonely and potassium-deficient.
Perfect for those nights when you want to feel sexy.
Guaranteed to stay on longer than your self-control.
Vault-Tec issued these 6-inch stilettos to remind you that even in a world without sex, you can still suffer for fashion.
Looks expensive. Probably is.
Crystal-clear, radiation-free hydration stored in durable metal can.
Neon-colored cocktail crafted in Gina’s steamy backroom.
Two huge, perfectly rounded meatballs that come with a zesty kick. The bigger, the better, right?
Fresh out of the oven and hot to the touch. Gina’s famous buns are soft, warm, and always ready for a good squeeze.
A mouthful you won’t forget.
Stuffed just right and oozing with flavor.
Dip it, dunk it, or drizzle it—this thick, savory gravy is perfect for any kind of meat.
Soft, warm, and gooey in the middle. This dessert will have you licking your fingers and coming back for seconds.
Burns like betrayal and hugs your liver like an angry ex.
Turns your enemies into Swiss cheese.
Become the vault’s greatest pervert without getting caught.
Comes in 'silent mode'.
Vault-Tec’s Patented 'Stress Reliever' - looks like a flashlight, sounds like a jackhammer.
Get slippery, stay safe, and keep those rads away while you go deep into vault activities.
A holotape featuring some velvet vocals and a lot of creaking.
Opening this feels like releasing Poseidon’s fart.
Opening this feels like releasing Poseidon’s fart.
The pre-war cure for second thoughts. Slows time. Accelerates mistakes.
Turn problems—and people—into vapor. Perfect for crowd control.
The juice of the wasteland's legendary lizard chad.
Warning: can spontaneously start throbbing on its own.
Guaranteed to grow long, firm, and ready for action—just add water, daddy.
Opening this feels like releasing Poseidon’s fart.
Opening this feels like releasing Poseidon’s fart.
Reeks of radiation and violence. Handle with caution.
A pre-war design that delivers searing energy blasts capable of melting armor.
Heavily mutated descendant of the pre-War largemouth bass.
She said she was ‘looking for tools.’ Boogey brought a wrench. And a camera.
Smells like a mix of defiance, regret, and 'I'm too good for this vault, but here we are.'
Warning: Contains more buns, sausages, and cream pies than the Purity Police can handle.
A pre-war relic containing the sexbot's original programming.
Fresh outta a laundry room, it’s got all the style of a 1950s janitor.
The contraband holotapes that turns your Pip-Boy into a Pip-Booty.
Turn the page, drop the pants, regret nothing.
Turn the page, drop the pants, regret nothing.
Turn the page, drop the pants, regret nothing.
Turn the page, drop the pants, regret nothing.
Turn the page, drop the pants, regret nothing.
Perfect for squeezing or tossing, they’re guaranteed to reduce stress by at least 69%.
Chunks of mutated meat, potatoes, and sparse vegetables—served warm.
The Merle Greaves' keys.
